channel.title: Fix my *Vote4Cash* System, should be easy fix for someone ~*REWARD*~
channel.description:
Hey Everyone. Im Currently making a *Vote4Cash* System, and im having a few problems. So far this is whats working. If they go to the Vote.php site and type in their username, then type ::claim in game they get 10,000,000. But, then they dont get redirected to the Actual MMORPG Voting Site.
[img]http://i1090.photobucket.com/albums/i366/Nexscape3859/104.png[/img] Then if you have already voted it comes up with this message..
[img]http://i1090.photobucket.com/albums/i366/Nexscape3859/105.png[/img]
So what im trying to say, is that I need the "Vote Now" button to redirect the person to my Voting site, unless they have already Voted. Other than that, the system works fine. I am REWARDING the person who can help me with this problem, as I have been at it for days. My TEAMVIEWER ID is 775 424 835 and PASS is 2900. Thanks

item.title: Fix my *Vote4Cash* System, should be easy fix for someone ~*REWARD*~
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

saadmboy:

EVERYONE HES LIENG I AMDE IT FOR HIM LAST NIGHT AND HE PROMISED ME AN RS ACCOUNT…THEN HE DIDN’T GIVE IT TO ME…THERES A POST SOMEWHERE ON FORUMS ASKING FOR HELP ON TEAMVIEWER WHERE HE WILL GIVE RS ACCOUNT FOR DOING IT FOR HIM…I KNEW HE’D SCAM SO I KINDA MESSED UP THE PHP PART…

Warned you
